name: Raylib arkanoid alpha
description:
Early alpha demo for a game Im working on, for learning purposes. For windows 64 only.

It's an arkanoid type game made with the awesome Raylib and c++

Raylib: https://www.raylib.com/

If you like it, consider donations :3, it'll help me to focus more on this.
Thank you for download it, dont forget to give feedback!

current status:

collisions work, bricks drop items, "steel" bricks with a hit animation, unbreakable bricks with animation, bricks with different colors, score works, only 1 stage, has a win condition but no loose condition, powerups dont do anything ATM but they can be collected. Base resolution is 320x240 scaled.
